content: If you've exhausted all the dialogue with the Pale-Axe Stalwart so far, the first thing you'll notice is that you've got his help when it comes to beating this boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Emerald Hall' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Crimson Silver Cart'.
The content is as follows:
If you've exhausted all the dialogue with the Pale-Axe Stalwart so far, the first thing you'll notice is that you've got his help when it comes to beating this boss.
